ある.english: to be; to exist; to live

行く.english: to go; to move (in a direction or towards a specific location); to head (towards); to be transported (towards); to reach

する.english: to do; to carry out; to perform

いる.english: to be (of animate objects); to exist

来る.english: to come (spatially or temporally); to approach; to arrive

見る.english: to see; to look; to watch; to view; to observe

使う.english: to use (a thing method etc.); to make use of; to put to use

書く.english: to write; to compose; to pen

かかる.english: to take (a resource e.g. time or money)

なる.english: to become; to get; to grow; to be; to reach; to attain

わかる.english: to understand; to comprehend; to grasp; to see; to get; to follow

乗る.english: to get on (train plane bus ship etc.); to get in; to board; to take; to embark

言う.english: to say; to utter; to declare

終わる.english: to end; to come to an end; to close; to finish

知る.english: to be aware of; to know; to be conscious of; to cognize; to cognise

始まる.english: to begin; to start; to commence

起きる.english: to get up; to rise; to blaze up (fire)
